channel.title: Time synchronization continuously fails upon startup
channel.description: Hi guys, I am running whonix through virtualbox on an ubuntu laptop and every time I startup the workstation the time sync fails. I have to keep restarting it until it finally catches on. I have the time set to UTC in the settings on virtualbox, is there any fix for this issue? Is this issue significant or can I just continue doing what I'm doing by restarting it over and over until it finally syncs?

item.title: Time synchronization continuously fails upon startup
item.dc:creator: ef86
item.description:
Thank you very much torjunkie for the solution. I had the same problem.

Problem solved!

ef86

Read full topic
